external_games.name: Wannyan Doubutsu Byouin: Pet no Oishasan ni Narou!

name: Wan Nyan Doubutsu Byouin: Pet no Oisha-san ni Narou!
storyline: The stage is an animal hospital, you will take good care of various kinds of animals at once!
summary:
Pet kept under various owners can simulate an important job of curing injuries and diseases, and while playing the game, you will foster animal! The stage is an animal hospital, you will take good care of various kinds of Wannyan at once! Appearing 30 kinds of sesame nihon!

A total of 20 types of Oshigoto games are included! In a hospital, as you do your job well, you will be able to leave more responsible roles. Rehabilitation to injury treatment, every day until your care, a wide range of work has become a game!

Holiday fun There are two days off every month. On this day, you can enjoy things other than work. In thetown there are shopping buildings, parks, movie theaters, etc. You can go out with hospital colleagues and my pets.

You can also enjoy coordinating fashion and interior! More than 700 kinds of fashion items are available for women & men! There are 24 kinds of hair styles you can choose! In addition you can choose from 5 different colors! There are 240 interior items in total! You can make a nice room depending on your ingenuity!
